channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Node Coloring
item.description: I learned something interesting today. I was solving a problem called “All Paths from Source Lead to Destination” and comparing it to “Find if Path Exists in Graph”. Both problems are very similar because they both require you to find a path from a source to a destination in a graph. The latter requires me to finf if “any” path exists, but the former is slightly hard because I have to find whether “all” paths lead to a destination.
